values.description:
Highpass design are a small design agency currently based in Brighton and Hove, Sussex. We have worked on projects from graphic design for major TV companies to website creation for small local businesses and we love the world of design. We've been at this lark for over 10 years and watched the trends of design come and go.

At Highpass we employ our staff on a job-by-job basis, with a creative pool of great designers, developers and general boffins that can provide you with the solutions you need.
values.name: Highpass Design
Damp Gnat Ltd
values.description:
Damp Gnat is Reece Millidge's games, interactive arts & animation studio in Brighton UK.
Our current focus is on developing entertaining games for browser and mobile with a strong emphasis on narrative and design to tickle the brain and challenge expectations.

Pathfinder Powerboat Club based in Southampton, provides an atmosphere for people to expand their horizions in powerboating. Whether new or old to powerboating this club hads something for you. We welcome boats capable of cruising at 22knts, our cruising grounds are from Brighton to Scilly, Southampton to France and the Channel Isles.
values.name: Pathfinder Powerboat Club

values.description:
In today’s fast moving high-pressured environment, companies are rapidly realising the value of encouraging & promoting health & wellness within the workplace.  The benefits to both the employee & employer are healthier individuals that are more alert, motivated & with reduced stress & absenteeism.

Working with both large & small organisations, from The Cabinet Office & No10 Downing Street, to companies with less than 50 employees.  Providing tailored programmes of health & wellness enlightenment via creative workshops & seminars.  These can take place in the workplace & can vary from breakfast meetings, lunchtime workshops or longer seminars – all tailored to the individual client requirements.

Able to identify health issues which can often be improved via nutritional intervention, utilising specific laboratory tests for example, food allergy testing, digestive disorders, blood profiling etc.

Operating across London and the South East with facilities in Harley Street, Brighton and Mid Sussex.

values: Health and wellness workshhops and seminars

values.name: Nutrition Lifestyle

values.description:
Kansas City's Premier Restaurant, Sports Bar & Pool Hall. Casual dining menu, numerous HDTV's for all the sporting events, 20 pool tables, 8 dart boards, shuffleboard, digital jukebox, video games, free WiFi & more! Full bar with 18 draft beer taps, & long stocked bar with diverse selection. We have seating for large parties & events, reservations accepted! Join us to watch your favorite college or pro game, pool & dart tournaments, NFL Sunday Ticket, UFC & sporting event watch parties, motorcycle events, fundraisers & more! The Brass Rail is consistently Voted the Best Place to Play Pool in the KC Northland! 

Brass Rail - Restaurant, Sports Bar & Pool Hall was established in 2004 in the Northland of Kansas City and is locally owned and operated. We are located on the SE corner of the intersection of Hwy 152 & N. Brighton Rd between Liberty & Gladstone. Kansas City PROUD!

Lunch, Dinner, Catering, Reservations for Parties & Events up to 600+ persons! Call or Email us for your reservation!
values.name: Brass Rail Sports Bar & Grill
Scrutineer's
values.description: Scrutineer's is a den in Brighton, where the inhabitants muck about with art stuff. They produce proper grown-up work > websites, books, animations, printed material etcetera, etcetera. They have their thumbs in many pies. Thankfully. They also waste vast amounts of time doing equally proper stuff for no financial gain whatsoever.

values.name: Mick Hawksworth Video
values.description:
Formerly an ITN senior designer for Channel 4 News and News at Ten, Mick has produced and directed arts-based documentaries for ITV Channel 4 and the BBC.

He is a lecturer at Brighton University School of Arts and Communication and has worked collaboratively with other artists and photographers on education, video and installation projects.

Hold is the collaboration of Steve Hyland, Anthony Oram and Stuart Langridge. Three friends with a shared history who decided to pool their various talents and experience to form a very singular design agency.

Hold work within a variety of industry sectors throughout the UK and the South East emanating from Brighton, East Sussex. Hold has experience designing for; Animal Conservation, Arts, Charity, Construction, Entertainment, Events, Environmental Campaigns, Fashion, Healthcare, Music, Publishing and Retail. Our disciplines include branding and corporate identity, illustration, art and photography direction, packaging, typography, print management, colour management, magazine and catalogue design, corporate literature and website design and development. Among our clients are such companies as; ATC Management, BMG, Dogs Trust, E-Day, HarperCollins Publishers, Snow+Rock, Sony Music and Oxford University’s WildCRU.
values.name: Hold

values.description:
Mortdecai Media is a newly established company with many years’ experience of online marketing, web design, project management and ecommerce.

The basic and main aim of the company is the simplification of processes;wishing to deliver clarity online, to both site owners and site users.

Following ethical long term strategies based upon intelligent methodologies to ensure that the work implemented is fully scalable and will achieve results which will be measurable and which can be built upon through agile processes.

Based in Brighton, UK, by the sea.
values.name: Mortdecai Media

values.description: HiTechy is a web consultancy business located in Brighton, UK. This venture is a freelance project run by Alexander Dawson. I provide a wide range of design, development, consultancy and writing services with a specialised interest in web standards, accessibility, usability and user-experience design.
values.name: HiTechy

values.description: Selling USA and Worldwide Postage Stamps, Stamp Collections and Accumulations,  Postal History, and supplies. Retail store located in Brighton, Michigan, USA with hours by appointment along with strong internet presence. In  business since 1992. Dealer member of the American Philatelic Society, Midwest Stamp Dealers Association
values.name: Sterling Stamps, LLC

Third rail Films
values.description:
Small prod co writing and developing Feature films and co-pros. Also working on a few Brit Pics [currently Brighton Rock [with Kudos/Optimum] previously Young Victoria.
In advanced dev. on Dead on the Money and Flicker  [Romantic Drama and Rom Comm respectively] Happy to look at spec scripts, but contact us first. No horror.

Moss Gilday Group has been an integral design team member for highly successful projects within the New York Metropolitan area. Recent projects include SkyView Parc in Flushing, Oceana in Brighton Beach, Renaissance Plaza in Downtown Brooklyn, mid and high-rise developments for AvalonBay Communities in White Plains, New Rochelle, Brooklyn, and Manhattan, residence housing for the College of Staten Island and Wagner College as well as on-going site renovation and expansion projects for the corporate campuses of Bristol-Meyer Squibb Company throughout New Jersey.
values.name: Moss Gilday Group
Blipmedia
values.description: We are a  network of internet professionals, based in the beautiful seaside city of Brighton and Hove, offering agency level web design, development and search engine optimisation at freelance prices. We also specialise in low cost content management systems

values.name: Bayside Psychotherapy
values.description: Counselling Services Melbourne, Professional Counsellor Melbourne, Brighton based Psychotherapist and Hypnotherapist uses a unique blend of Eastern and Western therapies to resolve numerous troubles and put balance into your life

values.name: Small Business Centre, Belleville ON
values.description: The Small Business Centre is your link to Ontario's small business support network. We are a leading source for business information in the Quinte area, which includes Belleville, Quinte West, Brighton, Prince Edward, Hastings and Lennox & Addington Counties. Whether you are just starting your own business or have been in business for less than five years, the Small Business Centre provides you with resources, tools and no-cost consultations to help you with your small business dream.

At TheBartender we specialise in the professional entertaining side of
cocktails and cocktail making.

We supply highly professional cocktail waiters and bartender hire for all occasions, such as garden & house parties, hen weekends, office parties, corporate events and wedding receptions.

We are based in Bristol but we do have bartenders in London & surrounding, Sheffield, Brighton, Reading, Plymouth, Chelmsford, Birmingham, Leeds, Manchester, Cardiff and Aberdeen.
values.name: The Bartender Hire Company
Andrea Dunne 'Textile DesignUK'
values.description: Textile Design UK is a company that designs and produces knitwear for fashion and the home. All materials are sourced within the British Isles, for example: Superfine Lamaine from Scotland, Merino from Yorkshire, Cotton from Lancashire, and each product is hand-made and hand-finished at a studio in Brighton & Hove. All designs are original taking inspiration only from nature through the eyes of Andrea Dunne herself.

Fibertec Environmental Services is a full service environmental analytical laboratory, specializing in subsurface investigations, industrial hygiene and natural gas analysis. Our corporate headquarters, analytical laboratory and industrial hygiene operations are located in Holt, Mich., our office in Brighton, Mich., specializes in subsurface investigations, such as Geoprobe and drilling operations, and our satellite laboratory is located in Cadillac, Mich., servicing northern Michigan. 









                                                    
.
values.name: Fibertec Environmental Services
